channel.title: CVE Feed for Sonatype -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Sonatype -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-1142|2024-03-06T20:08:21.962Z -- Sonatype -- IQ Server
item.description: Path Traversal in Sonatype IQ Server from version 143 allows remote authenticated attackers to overwrite or delete files via a specially crafted request. Version 171 fixes this issue.

item.title: CVE-2024-4956|2024-05-16T15:31:01.795Z -- Sonatype -- Nexus Repository
item.description: Path Traversal in Sonatype Nexus Repository 3 allows an unauthenticated attacker to read system files. Fixed in version 3.68.1.
